name: Snooze (the_nacho)
description:
Controls: Move your arm with the arrow keys, rotate your wrist with W and S, and attempt to press snooze with the spacebar.

It's time to get up, but you don't wanna. Give yourself a few more minutes of glorious sleep until you're ready to face the world.

You can only press snooze when one of your fingertips is over the button. If you miss, your hand will freeze for a second while you contemplate your life.

You may encounter a bug where you don't wake up after pressing snooze; if that happens, try refreshing the page.

Made for Ludum Dare 50: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/snooze-2

Source code is here: https://github.com/rotoclone/ludum-dare-50
